ygData.subject: Re: Guiding on Rodcet
ygData.msgSnippet: Well I haven t answered many petitions yet, but the people I ve talked to have been friendly so far.  Hopefully that will continue! - Tina
ygData.messageBody:
Well I haven't answered many petitions yet, but the people I've talked to
have been friendly so far. Hopefully that will continue!

- Tina

On Sun, 13 Feb 2000, Jose Antonio Muela wrote:

> From: Jose Antonio Muela <redspieder@...>
>
> congratulations :) i hope you enjoy your job as a guid, remember though
> that lots of poeple hate guids, so dont get offended when they start
> slandering you or guids in general, its just frustration from over the
> months of play :( but other than that, i understand it is a very
> fullfilling thing to do :) enjoy!
>
> redspider
>
> Christina Norman wrote:
> >
> > From: Christina Norman <tina@...>
> >
> > Hi everyone,
> >
> > I recently finished my guide training for Rodcet Nife. I'm now an
> > apprentice guide there. One of the things they told us in training
> > was...don't tell anyone you're a guide! Well it's a bit too late for that
> > hehee.
> >
> > Unfortunately though I've learned I'm not allowed to handle petitions for
> > any of my friends. That's not that big a deal though really. I hope
> > you'll all say hi to me when you see me on =)
> >
> > My guide character's name is Zute.
> >
> > - Tina
